mean_cn: vt. （用实例、实验）论证；演示；示范；  vi. 示威
mean_en: to show something clearly by giving proof or evidence
word_etyma: de加强 + monstr指出 + ate动词后缀 → demonstrate 证明
short_phrase: demonstrate how the light bulb works
sentence: This experiment demonstrates the chemical principle we are discussing.
sentence_trans: 这个实验论证了我们讨论的化学原理。
